title: travelplanner: Can you create a travel plan for a group of 5 departing from Charlotte heading to Hilton Head, to be carried out over 3 days, from March 26th to March 28th, 2022? The budget for this trip is capped at $7,000. We have a preference for Italian and French cuisines during our trip. (22a13b87516054bc)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

chat_history.content:
Here are the transportation options from Charlotte to Hilton Head for March 26th, 2022, for a group of 5 people:

### Flight Options:
1. **Flight F4055090**
   - **Price:** $92 per person
   - **Departure Time:** 18:07
   - **Arrival Time:** 19:27
   - **Duration:** 1 hour 20 minutes

2. **Flight F4059890**
   - **Price:** $95 per person
   - **Departure Time:** 13:01
   - **Arrival Time:** 14:22
   - **Duration:** 1 hour 21 minutes

### Self-Driving Option:
- **Duration:** 3 hours 49 minutes
- **Distance:** 398 km
- **Estimated Cost:** $19 (for fuel)

### Considerations:
- **Flights:** Faster but more expensive, especially for a group of 5.
- **Self-Driving:** More economical but takes longer.

Please choose the option that best suits your group's preferences and needs.

chat_history.content:
Here are some popular attractions in Hilton Head that you can visit from March 26th to March 28th, 2022:

1. **Coastal Discovery Museum**
   - Address: 70 Honey Horn Dr, Hilton Head Island, SC 29926, USA
   - Phone: (843) 689-6767
   - Website: [coastaldiscovery.org](http://www.coastaldiscovery.org/)

2. **Harbour Town Lighthouse**
   - Address: 149 Lighthouse Rd, Hilton Head Island, SC 29928, USA
   - Phone: (866) 305-9814
   - Website: [harbourtownlighthouse.com](http://www.harbourtownlighthouse.com/)

3. **Coligny Beach Park**
   - Address: 1 Coligny Circle, Hilton Head Island, SC 29928, USA
   - Phone: (843) 342-4580

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").
current_city.title: Current City

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"
transportation.title: Transportation

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"
breakfast.title: Breakfast

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"
attraction.title: Attraction

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
accommodation.title: Accommodation

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City

chat_history.name: attraction_search

chat_history.content:
Here are some popular attractions in Hilton Head that you can visit from March 26th to March 28th, 2022:

1. **Coastal Discovery Museum**
   - Address: 70 Honey Horn Dr, Hilton Head Island, SC 29926, USA
   - Phone: (843) 689-6767
   - Website: [coastaldiscovery.org](http://www.coastaldiscovery.org/)

2. **Harbour Town Lighthouse**
   - Address: 149 Lighthouse Rd, Hilton Head Island, SC 29928, USA
   - Phone: (866) 305-9814
   - Website: [harbourtownlighthouse.com](http://www.harbourtownlighthouse.com/)

3. **Coligny Beach Park**
   - Address: 1 Coligny Circle, Hilton Head Island, SC 29928, USA
   - Phone: (843) 342-4580
   - Website: [hiltonhead.com/coligny-beach-park](https://www.hiltonhead.com/coligny-beach-park/)

4. **Folly Field Beach Park**
   - Address: 55 Starfish Dr, Hilton Head Island, SC 29928, USA
   - Phone: (843) 341-4600
   - Website: [hiltonheadislandsc.gov/parks/FollyFieldBeach](https://hiltonheadislandsc.gov/parks/FollyFieldBeach/)

5. **Driessen Beach Park**
   - Address: 64 Bradley Beach Rd, Hilton Head Island, SC 29928, USA
   - Phone: (843) 842-5698
   - Website: [hiltonheadislandsc.gov/ourisland/Parks/parksandfacdetails.cfm?FacilityID=29](http://www.hiltonheadislandsc.gov/ourisland/Parks/parksandfacdetails.cfm?FacilityID=29)

6. **Historic Mitchelville Freedom Park**
   - Address: 229 Beach City Rd, Hilton Head Island, SC 29926, USA
   - Phone: (843) 255-7301

7. **Sea Pines Forest Preserve**
   - Address: Hilton Head Island, SC 29928, USA
   - Phone: (843) 842-1979

8. **Fish Haul Beach Park**
   - Address: 120 Mitchelville Rd, Hilton Head Island, SC 29926, USA
   - Phone: (843) 341-4600
   - Website: [hiltonheadislandsc.gov/parks/FishHaulBeach](https://www.hiltonheadislandsc.gov/parks/FishHaulBeach/)

9. **Pirates of Hilton Head**
   - Address: 149 Lighthouse Rd, Hilton Head Island, SC 29928, USA
   - Phone: (843) 363-7000
   - Website: [piratesofhiltonhead.com](http://piratesofhiltonhead.com/)

10. **Shelter Cove Community Park**
    - Address: 39 Shelter Cove Ln, Hilton Head Island, SC 29928, USA
    - Phone: (843) 341-4600
    - Website: [hiltonheadislandsc.gov/parks/ShelterCove](https://www.hiltonheadislandsc.gov/parks/ShelterCove/)

11. **King Neptune Sundial**
    - Address: 13 Harbourside Ln, Hilton Head Island, SC 29928, USA
    - Website: [sheltercovehiltonhead.com](https://www.sheltercovehiltonhead.com/post/celebrating-palmetto-dunes-resort-s-50th-anniversary-a-history-of-neptune-statue?utm_campaign=GoogleBusiness&utm_medium=local&utm_source=Google&utm_content=KingNeptune)

12. **The Sandbox Children's Museum**
    - Address: 80 Nassau St, Hilton Head Island, SC 29928, USA
    - Phone: (843) 842-7645
    - Website: [thesandbox.org](http://www.thesandbox.org/)

13. **Gregg Russell Harbour Town Playground**
    - Address: 140 Lighthouse Rd, Hilton Head Island, SC 29928, USA
    - Phone: (843) 785-3333
    - Website: [seapines.com](https://www.seapines.com/resort_activities/harbour_town/playground.aspx)

14. **Stoney Baynard Ruins**
    - Address: Plantation Dr, Hilton Head Island, SC 29928, USA
    - Website: [heritagelib.org](https://heritagelib.org/the-stoneys-the-baynards-and-their-mansion?rq=Stoney%20baynard)

15. **Gullah Museum of Hilton Head Island**
    - Address: 12 Georgianna Dr, Hilton Head Island, SC 29926, USA
    - Phone: (843) 681-3254
    - Website: [gullahmuseumhhi.org](http://www.gullahmuseumhhi.org/)

16. **Pirates HHI**
    - Address: 86 Helmsman Way, Hilton Head Island, SC 29928, USA
    - Phone: (843) 415-8400
    - Website: [pirateshhi.com](http://www.pirateshhi.com/)

17. **Atlantic Ocean Beach**
    - Address: 2 Shelter Cove Ln, Hilton Head Island, SC 29928, USA

18. **Lowcountry Celebration Park**
    - Address: 94 Pope Ave, Hilton Head Island, SC 29928, USA
    - Phone: (843) 341-4600
    - Website: [hiltonheadislandsc.gov/parks/LowcountryCelebration/home.cfm](https://hiltonheadislandsc.gov/parks/LowcountryCelebration/home.cfm)

19. **Adventure Hilton Head**
    - Address: 33 Broad Creek Marina Way, Hilton Head Island, SC 29926, USA
    - Phone: (843) 682-6000
    - Website: [myadventurehiltonhead.com](https://myadventurehiltonhead.com/)

Enjoy your trip to Hilton Head!
